page.title: 02GOBOWEN, PAST AND PRESENT
page.content: With the coming of the{railway}in 1895 {Gobowen}developed at a pace. The new section of the{A5 road}encouraged further development,as did the arrival of the{Orthopaedic Hospital}from Baschurch. The station,alas, is no longer our pride and joy,and is being allowed to crumble,despite the fact that it is a{listed building}of outstanding historical and architectural importance. The A5 which virtually bisects the village, is getting busier and busier. Work will soon begin on the {Gobowen,Whittington and West Felton {By-pass.}The traffic through Gobowen will be reduced by 85 per cent.Old prints show that the centre of Gobowen used to be very attractive. If only the station could be restored to its former glory,the village would be revitalised.
